attributes.action: Prevent lefties from creating pointless petition's such as Donald Trump/Brexit
attributes.background: The House of commons have better things to do than debate a leftie petition every other day

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition calling for a specific change to the rules for petitions. You can find out about the rules here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/help
